# cuopt-user resources

This folder contains **long-form examples** referenced by `.github/agents/cuopt-user.md`.

They are kept out of the main agent doc to reduce prompt bloat in environments that eagerly ingest Markdown files.

Contents:

- `c_api_examples.md` — C API examples + build/run notes
- `python_examples.md` — Python API examples (routing + LP/MILP/QP)
- `server_examples.md` — REST server examples (start server, curl, Python `requests`)
- `cli_examples.md` — CLI examples (MPS creation + solve commands)
